me.title: Sebastian Remar
me.subtitle: Generalist Software Engineer passionate about solving problems.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: I've been in the software game for about 5 years now, working at places like Amazon and Meta. Originally from Lima, Peru. Studied Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering, but ended up going the self-taught route into software.
about.p2: I'm a generalist. Scaling problems, latency issues, product decisions. I go where the problems are and figure it out.
about.p3: Outside of work, I spend time helping new grads and college students with career growth, sharing everything I've learned throughout my time in tech. If I can help someone skip a few of the mistakes I made, that's a win.
about.p4: When I'm not working, you'll probably find me traveling somewhere new or playing ping pong.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Want to chat? Feel free to reach out.
